title: Inspection expenses
context: ยง514A-34 Inspection expenses. When an inspection is to be made of projects, the developer shall be required to pay an amount estimated by the commission to be necessary to cover the actual expenses of the inspection, not to exceed $500 a day for each day consumed in the examination of the project plus reasonable first-class transportation expenses. [L 1977, c 98, pt of ยง2; am L 1991, c 44, ยง5]
